input: Find the UUIDs of bank accounts that have more than 10 entries and are linked to contracts with a planned cancellation date in the future.

output.sql: SELECT T1.UUID FROM BankAccount AS T1 JOIN BankAccountEntries AS T2 ON T1.UUID = T2.BankAccountUUID GROUP BY T1.UUID HAVING COUNT(T2.UUID) > 10 AND T1.PlannedCancellationDate > CURRENT_DATE;
